description: A task for running arbtrary gdal commands with bash on the commandline interface.  It automatically iterates over all files of type you specify, or just runs a single command, specified via string port input.

inputPortDescriptors.description: The command to be exxecuted.  Substitute $input for input file, $output for output file, $indir for input directory, $outdir for output directory.
inputPortDescriptors.name: command

inputPortDescriptors.description: Filetype to iterate over and run on.
inputPortDescriptors.name: filetype

inputPortDescriptors.description: options: runonce | foreach.  Runonce executes the command once.  Foreach searches for files of type filetype, and runs the command for each one found.
inputPortDescriptors.name: execution_strategy

name: gdal-cli
